Module com.spokostudios
Package com.spokostudios.services.dbservice

Class DBService

java.lang.Object
com.spokostudios.services.dbservice.DBService
public class DBService extends Object
The database service to pull connection logic out of the controllers. It was orginally a singular monolith. With appoinments a new class was created to help create modularity.
